## RetryOptions.retryUntil property

Additional check to verify that the operation was successful. This is needed in cases where a DOM node is present and we clicked on it, but the framework that rendered the node didn't set up any event listeners yet.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
retryUntil?: () => Promise<boolean>;
```
